criteria: Identification of Author and Illustrator and Definition of Roles
descriptions: The student is unable to identify the author or illustrator of the story.
The student can identify either the author or the illustrator, but not both, and struggles to define their roles.
The student can identify both the author and the illustrator, but struggles to define their roles in telling the story.
The student can identify the author and illustrator and provides a basic definition of their roles, but lacks depth.
The student accurately identifies the author and illustrator and explains their roles in contributing to the story with some detail.

The student expertly identifies the author and illustrator and provides a comprehensive explanation of their distinct roles in shaping the story, demonstrating a clear understanding of their contributions.
